description: The RCA PCHSTAB2R puts USB and AC outlets where you need them most, from the bedroom, office, family room or kitchen. It has 2 USB outlets 2.1A and 1.0A and provides convenient power outlets at the table for clock radios, lamps, laptop use, etc. It's compatible with smartphones and any other USB devices and provides a convenient AC outlet for other electronics, such as lamps or clocks.
title: RCA PCHSTAB2R USB Charging Dock with Device Cradle
